definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Does electronical computer based on microprocessors made of silicon chip come to an end?
sentences.chinese: 以硅片微处理器为核心的电子计算机要走到尽头了吗？

sentences.english: No wonder people sy tht computers tke over theworld.
sentences.chinese: 难怪有人说电子计算机正渐渐接收世界。

sentences.english: Electronic computers have great importance in the production of modern industry.
sentences.chinese: 电子计算机在现代工业生产中很重要。

sentences.english: No wonder people say that computers are catching over the earth.
sentences.chinese: 难怪有人说电子计算机正渐渐接筦世界。

sentences.english: The measurement is automatical recorded by a specialized electronic computer.
sentences.chinese: 测量结果用专用电子计算机自动记录。

sentences.english: No wonder people say that puters are taking over the world.
sentences.chinese: 难怪有人说电子计算机正渐渐接管世界。

sentences.english: Electronic computers work quickly and accurately.
sentences.chinese: 电子计算机算得既快又准确。

sentences.english: Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work in all branches of learning.
sentences.chinese: 电子计算机能从事各种专业知识的极为复杂工作。

sentences.english: Our company has decided to computerize its wages department.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司已决定用电子计算机控制工资部门。

sentences.english: In many countries, more and more companies are replacing people with computers .
sentences.chinese: 在许多有越来越多的公司使用电子计算机宋代替人。

sentences.english: RISC designs trace their root to the first eletronic computers.
sentences.chinese: RISC的设计可以追溯到第一台电子计算机。

sentences.english: The increase of the numbers of the city would frustrate even the biggest computer.
sentences.chinese: 城市数量的增加会让最强大的电子计算机也感到畏惧。

sentences.english: Computers have become element of our everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 电子计算机正垂垂成为我们日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: Accurate and rapid computation chiefly characterizes the electronic computer.
sentences.chinese: 计算精确而快速是该电子计算机的主要特点。

sentences.english: Design calculation of chamber sand-mold drying oven is programmed by comuter instead of using diagram method.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用电子计算机进行砂型室式干燥炉的设计计算。

sentences.english: Computers haudio-videoe be a compenent of our everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 电子计算机正垂垂成为我们日常生活的一局部。
